title: Green Tech In India Estimated To Reach $45-55 Billion By 2027: Bcg Report | Mint - Mint
content: Green Tech In India Estimated To Reach $45-55 Billion By 2027: Bcg Report | Mint  Mint
description: The American global management consulting firm believes that the green tech in the country is still at a nascent stage, and expects innovation and investment to support growth ahead.
